channel.title: Unfair Server Status Page?
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=174.121.33.162
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/35ice93.jpg[/img]
LOL Running an RSPS on port 80 and look at the ip too :D
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2rd84mg.jpg[/img]
LMFAOO IP is a hostgator web-server ip address? Sarcasm*Im sure hostgator has a runescape private server***
No wonder all servers that do this have 100% uptime?
For real, this is really unfair for us who put our true valid information and have valid uptime. Cheaters like this just fuck up the whole value of the server status page. Moparisthebest, please take action in preventing such cheapness from continuing.

item.title: Unfair Server Status Page?
item.dc:creator: @Ramster Ramster
item.description:
@Ramster wrote:

SOOOO?
Is someone gunna do something about this or is this gunna be ignored too?
